description: Formats a date value as a text.

input.name: value
input.description:
The input date/time value.
If unspecified, the current date/time will be used.

input.name: format
input.description:
Format tokens based on Unicode Technical Standard #35.
See: https://momentjs.com/docs/#/displaying/format/.
Defaults to `ISO 8601`.

input.name: locale
input.description:
A language locale to be used when formatting the values.
See https://github.com/moment/moment/tree/develop/locale.
If unspecified, it defaults to `en-GB`.

output.name: text
output.description: The date as a formatted text.
